title: [Medicine] A University of Oxford-led research team developed a blood test based on a single-cell Raman platform achieved a 91 percent accuracy in distinguishing ME/CFS patients from healthy individuals and disease controls

[Health] Trial study on humans (N=97) found that a 20mg of methotrexate weekly oral dose -over six months- had a moderate effect in reducing pain and stiffness in patients with symptomatic hand osteoarthritis (OA)
